version.author: gaspard
version.changelog: • Fix track visibility in collapsed folders inside folders. • Update selection and collapse check. • Optimisation and small fixes.

version.author: gaspard
version.changelog: • Update GUI elements • Small fixes and improvements

version.author: gaspard
version.changelog: • Fix collapsed state of folders at same depth in same parent folder.

version.author: gaspard
version.changelog: • Bugfix: Removed flicker on collapse track to state 1 (medium) with link tcp collapse enabled • Bugfix: Unlink selection at start if setting disabled • Gui fixes and improvements • Added debug lines in script

version.author: gaspard
version.changelog: • Feature: Added link tcp mute setting and visual in GUI

version.author: gaspard
version.changelog: • GUI Fix: invisible inner borders in tables

version.author: gaspard
version.changelog: • Bugfix: Tracks display not updated on depth change • Update: Add text if no tracks in project

version.author: gaspard
version.changelog: • New feature: Added Mute for tracks (toggle in settings) • Minor bugfix and improvements

version.author: gaspard
version.changelog: • New feature: Added Solo for tracks (toggle in settings) • Numerous bugfix and improvements

version.author: gaspard
version.changelog: • Remove debug logs • Bugfix and improvements

version.author: gaspard
version.changelog: • Added Ctrl+A and Escape shortcuts to select and unselect all tracks in GUI
